list_definition.definition: (the study or management of) money affairs

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is an expert in finance.

list_definition.definition: the money one has to spend

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The government is worried about the state of the country’s finances.

list_definition.mean_english: cấp tiền cho; bỏ vốn cho; tài trợ
list_definition.definition: to give money for (a plan, business etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Will the company finance your trip abroad?
